corda / net.corda.core.transactions / FilterFuns

FilterFuns

class FilterFuns

Holds filter functions on transactions fields. Functions are used to build a partial tree only out of some subset of original transaction fields.

Constructors

<init> FilterFuns(filterInputs: (StateRef) -> Boolean = { false }, filterOutputs: (TransactionState<ContractState>) -> Boolean = { false }, filterAttachments: (SecureHash) -> Boolean = { false }, filterCommands: (Command) -> Boolean = { false })

Holds filter functions on transactions fields. Functions are used to build a partial tree only out of some subset of original transaction fields.
